page.title: List of United States Senators from New Hampshire

revisions.rev:
Both of [[New Hampshire]]'s current senators, [[Jeanne Shaheen]] (D) and [[Kelly Ayotte]] (R), are serving their first terms in the [[United States Senate]]. __TOC__ == Class 2 == [[Classes of United States Senators|Class 2]] [[United States Senate|U.S. Senators]] belong to the electoral cycle that were elected for two sessions of the [[United States Congress|U.S. Congress]] in the first election of 1788 and whose seats in recent years are contested in [[United States Senate elections, 1996|1996]], [[United States Senate elections, 2002|2002]], [[United States Senate elections, 2008|2008]], and 2014. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- ! # !
